metadata.name: PUA - NPS Tunneling Tool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of NPS, a port forwarding and intranet penetration proxy server

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\npc.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -server=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -vkey=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -password=')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -config=npc')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=ae8acf66bfe3a44148964048b826d005')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha1=cea49e9b9b67f3a13ad0be1c2655293ea3c18181')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=5a456283392ffceeeaca3d3426c306eb470304637520d72fed1cc1febbbd6856'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of NPS, a port forwarding and intranet penetration proxy server

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use Reference: https://github.com/ehang-io/nps
